name: Stickman Gun Shooting 2
description:
Classic stickman gun shooting game!
A gang of gangster have attacked the wild west town,as the police,your mission is to eliminate the target stickman.
Pull out your gun and take aim while hiding behind a barrel,you must react quickly,otherwise they will kill you.
Try to survive from the enemy stickmen's rain bullets!
Become the king of gun shooter!
